titleStmt.title: A discourse and defence of arms and armory, shewing the nature and rises of arms and honour in England, from the camp, the court, the city: under the two later of which, are contained universities and inns of court. / By Edward Waterhous Esq;.
titleStmt.author: Waterhouse, Edward, 1619-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for Samuel Mearne in Little Britain,
